title: [Old Version] McAfee Safe Connect VPN 2022 | 5 Device | Internet Security and Privacy Software | Windows/Mac/ChromeOS/Android/iOS | 1 Year Subscription | Key Card
description: Protect your online privacy whenever, wherever with McAfee Safe Connect Premium VPN. Much like a firewall protects the data on your computer, a VPN (Virtual Private Network) protects your activity by encrypting (or scrambling) your data when you connect to the internet from a remote or public location so you can hide your IP address and online activity. Protect your personal data and credit card info with McAfee Safe Connect Premium VPN—a smart VPN that automatically turns on when you need it. Confidently browse, bank, and shop online knowing your data is protected with bank-grade encryption. Whether you’re paying bills, managing investments, or just exploring, McAfee Safe Connect Premium VPN helps your family stay private online, wherever and whenever, with connection speeds that keep up with you.
